user_dictionary_dashboard.title: User Dictionary – Admin Dashboard
user_dictionary_dashboard.subtitle: Review and manage words submitted from all spellcheck clients.
user_dictionary_dashboard.overview: End users of the spellcheck applications submit new words. This dashboard lets admins review those submissions, approve valid words into the main dictionary, or remove entries that should not be suggested.
user_dictionary_dashboard.table: The pending words table lists all user-submitted words awaiting review, including who added them, their frequency, and when they were created. Use search and pagination to navigate.
user_dictionary_dashboard.selection: Use row checkboxes and ‘Select all’ to perform bulk actions. Approve selected moves words into the main dictionary; Delete selected removes them from the user dictionary.
user_dictionary_dashboard.manual_add_delete: The manual Add and Remove panels let admins directly queue and submit specific words, using comma- or space-separated input.
user_dictionary_dashboard.upload: The bulk upload section accepts .txt and .docx files, extracts words, and updates frequencies in the user dictionary. An optional source label helps identify where the words came from.
user_dictionary_dashboard.log: The activity log shows a chronological list of add, delete, upload, and approve operations performed from this dashboard.
